website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive, no-frills back scratcher. It might suit you if you don't need a long length.
pros: Basic design is simple, classic, and easy to use
Fingers tend to be just right – neither too dull nor too sharp
cons: It's significantly shorter than other scratchers and may not reach tough spots

customer_reviews.title: My wonderful "Back Scratcher"
customer_reviews.text: This "Back Scratcher" is wonderful ! I'm 63 years old and no longer as limber as I was a few years ago. I've had some shoulder damage from my..."I'm indestructible" days.(Turns out I wasn't.) You always seem to need a good scratching in the exact part of your back that you can't reach. Enter the "Bamboo Back Scratcher"...AAAHHH.... Wonderful !! It came well packaged and earlier than expected, and I've used it every day since. Sometimes I don't even have an itch to scratch...it just feels great. Highly recommended ?? Oh yeah !
customer_reviews.author: TonyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Poorly done
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect a lot for $5 and that is exactly what I got. The finish of the product is not acceptable. Every 'finger' knuckle has a layer of splinters on it. Can they be sanded down? Yes. Can it be refinished? Yes. Should that be necessary? No. Leave it in the steam longer before you bend it, folks. Even then, FINISH the product to prevent buyers from having to dig out bamboo splinters or destroying clothing.
customer_reviews.author: canyncarvr

customer_reviews.title: Back scratcher? Back scratcher! Back scratcher!!! ...and so much more...!
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this as a back scratcher for a HUMAN. My dogs LOVE this used on them and honestly it makes it easier at times to scratch the bigger one. She will just sit there while I'm sitting on the sofar and I don't even have to get up. ANOTHER USE I have discovered is for pellet stoves with hoppers. I have this pellet stove...  Sometimes the pellets don't away keep falling into the feed shoot and they need to be pushed. Rather than reaching inside the hopper, I use one of these! Every pellet stove should come with one!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Works Well, Somewhat Thin, Needs Further Sanding
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I recommend this product. It works just like ones I've used in the past and is long enough to reach lower parts of your back. It's a bit on the thin side, but it's bamboo, so maybe that's why. Mine has a crack towards where they set the hole for the string. It also needs a little further sanding where you would use it scratch your back. Otherwise, it's nicely built, looks sleek and has a nice wood-burned logo (albeit off-center). I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Some Person

customer_reviews.title: Great! Need one for every room and office.
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time. Especially in the winter. Not too sharp by default, but for those of us who like options, a little bit of rough sandpaper will let you customize how rough you want it. Being a single piece and wide make it easy to use and hold and put pressure where you need it... and it doesn't rotate when you don't want it to. A problem usually found with those telescopic ones.
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. At 17.5 inches it EASILY reaches ANYWHERE you need to on your back without having to force yourself into uncomfortable positions. I love it and use it daily. It is a bit thin but that isn't an issue as I am scratching my back not trying to carve a design into it. I have had this for several months now and it reaches everywhere I need to with out having to uncomfortably stretch or reach. Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: Cable

customer_reviews.title: Splinters!
customer_reviews.text: Splinters were on the teeth of the item that were very sharp, also the teeth are so sharp and rough that it is virtually painful to use even through clothing. Not worth the trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky&Sugar

customer_reviews.title: arrived with cracked prong but otherwise, does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what else you can expect from a typical back scratcher. She does her job. But, I was a little disappointed that mine came with a cracked prong (you know- one of the little "fingers") which means that I can't use this above my clothes or it will snag them. But whatever, I'm desperate for some itching relief so I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't bother to spend one dollar on this 👎🏻
customer_reviews.text: Came completely rough, unvarnished, and seems that someone stepped on it (it has a shoe print that can't be washed or removed). Seems that they buy this in huge amounts and they don't even take the time to check that the product is fully varnished, the "fingers" came uneven and unvarnish and when I scratched my husband a piece of chipped wood got on his back.
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty decent back scratcher. My only complaint is that it is obviously made of cheap material. I got two of them and both of them it was easy to tell that it wasn't exactly the best crafted item. It doesn't have a smooth finish and the wood feels rough to the touch. There are still shavings of wood hanging from the window where it was cut for the scratcher. Although it doesn't look the best, it does exactly what it's supposed to. Overall, it's a decent scratcher but I think you'd be better off saving for something better.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Weissenburger

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver when you only have use of one arm!
customer_reviews.text: There is always that one spot you can't reach to scratch that drives you nuts then you find yourself scratching your back on a door jamb! I bought this when I was preparing to get rotator cuff (shoulder) surgery. I think I would have gone nuts without it. Some of the medication I was on after the surgery made me itch and since I couldn't use my right arm I was so so so thankful for this back scratcher!. It is really long so it will reach anyplace you need it to! I think every household needs a few of these. My husband uses it also.
customer_reviews.author: Kblain

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews for other back scratchers that are made out of plastic I definitely decided to go with one solid piece. Very sturdy and does what it should. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Co

customer_reviews.title: Too rough - Not finished or sanded enough.
customer_reviews.text: Back scrat her would have been fine if it had been sanded. It snagged skin and clothes, and had rough edges where handle is - too rough to grip. Going to try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie P.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible..
customer_reviews.text: Terrible... I am so disappointed! It finally arrived and it is broken. It was clearly broken before it was placed in the box. I will definitely be sending this back for another.
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: I can't reach
customer_reviews.text: You know when you get to that age and your just not as flexible anymore? Yea, I'm starting to get there. I bought this product because I hate it when the area between my shoulder blades start to itch and I can't reach it! This has been a god send since I got it. No more trying to find a wall corner or door frame to use to scratch that itch. It's a sturdy product and has a smooth coating to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the bamboo back scratchers - they work well. You used to be able to find them for $1! This one is sturdy and just what I needed since I accidentally donated mine with some other things.
customer_reviews.author: Teri Waites

customer_reviews.title: Holy Backscratcher Batman
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase I have made in my life. My back itches, this magical stick makes the itches go away. I'd buy ten if I were richer and have one in every room, every vehicle. Hell, I'd Velcro one on myself to have with me at all times of the day. Do yourself a favor and just do it...just buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Melodiousfunk4

customer_reviews.title: Nice grabber for short people.
customer_reviews.text: The item is well made and has a nice smooth finish. My short wife uses it to reach the pull chains on our ceiling fan and light. I removed the center tooth to make room for the chain to fit between the other teeth. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: pacojack

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: No rough edges to scratch your back and came with a crack in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: it looks nice and is very solid
customer_reviews.text: originally got it for my wife whose back is always itchy... She couldn't use it because the curves in the claw were so pronounced that it tends to send your flesh rather than scratch. I can confirm, this is more of a fleshing tool than back scratcher. Aside from that, it looks nice and is very solid.
customer_reviews.author: EM ES

customer_reviews.title: THE WOOD NEEDS TO BE FINISHED AND NOT HAVE SHARP SPLINTERS
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT WOULD HAVE BEEN USABLE JUST FINE IF THE WOOD HADN'T BEEN SPLIT AND ROUGH, GIVING ME A SPLINTER CUT IN MY FINGER. PLEASE REPLACE IT WITH ONE NOT DAMAGED. THANKS, DIANNE MARSH
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: Great, sturdy product. My only wish was that it was a little bit longer for better reach. Would give 4.5 stars if Amazon would let me. If this brand was available in a 20" model, I would absolutely purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Very poor merchant.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived with the scratchingn end splintered. It came in a very large box with many air pillows so I can only assume it was packed damaged. This is a $1 item for which I paid $5 and not worth the trouble to return.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Steiner

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: It's better than a wife' scratch...and doesn't argue as much!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Talker

customer_reviews.title: Great scratcher
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what it says. Works great would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I got exactly what I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for a man so it’s sturdiness was important.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: The bamboo back scratcher I had previously was from the mid '80's, and was half as thick as this one, and only broke because I was goofing off with it watching TV. Bamboo may not be as pretty as wood, but the fibers inside make them much stronger, without adding any weight. If the Chinese can use it for scaffolding for building construction, it will work for an itchy back.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: One one you'd need.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the metal back scratcher (the one that you get five in one shot) and ALL of them broke within a week. This one has been perfect from day one. Wish we just bought this one right off.
customer_reviews.author: Cobham D Still

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: feel amazing on my back, not too hard or soft. I use this every day and hate when I forget it at home when I stay somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Beck

customer_reviews.title: Finished only on one side, and rough on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Finished only on one side, and rough on the other. It is a splintery mess that will snag on clothes. This isn't worth the bother to return, but I am certainly sorry that I paid money for it.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: All of this scratchin is makin me itch (reference to early scratch/spin DJ music). Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I'm tall and this reaches all the right places! I have had several of the "expandable" ones (bear claw type) and they have all broken. This seems sturdier and the scratch is just right. It says Japan but is actually made in China (of course, what isn't these days...)
customer_reviews.author: M. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it, already threw it away
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't scratch very well, the end of it that does the scratching hardly has any tongs to scratch with, it's mostly flat
customer_reviews.author: Robin H Sanner

customer_reviews.title: It will scratch an itch.
customer_reviews.text: Living lonesome, I would go for days at a time without any human contact to scratch my back for me. And rubbing against the doorjamb lacks the precision needed for a quality scratch. With this backscratcher, I suffer an itchy back no longer. Now, I can continue my life of solitude without all that pesky human interaction.
customer_reviews.author: david zalewski

customer_reviews.title: The wood on the handle was not intact, so ...
customer_reviews.text: The wood on the handle was not intact, so I had to put tape around it to prevent splinters. Since the scratcher part worked I did not return it. If I could find one of these locally I would buy it. If I need another one I would not buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Lejah

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value - costs a bit more than others but ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value - costs a bit more than others but worth it. I had two old bamboo back scratchers, dog ate one. Quality of this replacement is visibly better than the one I have - a bit longer, stronger, better looking in general. Seems to scratch better too. Arrived in less than 24 hours using ordinary Prime shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Luma

customer_reviews.title: Hard to reach places
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time. Product itself can use some quality control. Wood was splintering but some sanding down with 800 grit sand paper took care of that. Overall it works.
customer_reviews.author: T Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the teeth was broken when I opened package and it is flimsy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just okay...
customer_reviews.text: For me, the claw on the back scratcher is just too smooth and doesn't fully alleviate the feeling of having an itch.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: and I'm a bit disappointed. I went with bamboo because I have sensitivities ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail today, and I'm a bit disappointed. I went with bamboo because I have sensitivities to metal, but this one came with parts of it splintered up, and it hurts my skin if I'm not careful. It gets the job done, but I'll probably get a different one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Too slick from heavy varnish
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice size and seems sturdy but it's varnished so heavily that I get more scratch "friction" from a terry cloth towel. I may try sanding off some of the varnish. Not that I want to dig holes at the itch site, but this has got about the same roughness as a wooden spoon.
customer_reviews.author: Kim D.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. The wood is splintered all along the edges and the underside. A retail sticker was placed on the top and is very difficult to remove and leaves residue badly. Go to Bed Bath and Beyond and spend the same amount for a much higher quality back scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: Roland Russ

customer_reviews.title: Good product, wish they had more options
customer_reviews.text: Good product wiah they made a travel one that is compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Rocellie Reyes-Biliditto

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father during his hospital say. It came promptly and does the job just fine, according to the anecdotal evidence I've managed to receive on it. I think it would feasibly reach most parts of the back provided one has a sufficient range of arm motion. The wood is sturdy and I didn't see any danger potential danger of splinters. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: D N

customer_reviews.title: Sharp "fingers."
customer_reviews.text: Nice and long, but the "fingers" are rather sharp and care must be used or skin could be ripped or torn. I threw it into my fire pit and have gone back to using a plastic one.
customer_reviews.author: MadMax

customer_reviews.title: Great back scratcher! Good quality! Scratches the itch
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, good qualitty. It scratches the back well. What a relief to finally get that itch! I wish the handle could be a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: Shy girl

customer_reviews.title: Totally a $5.00 joke!
customer_reviews.text: Received a split bamboo stick, the kind people normally throw away!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Splintering
customer_reviews.text: It was already a late delivery for some reason and the same day I received it, it is already splintering. Trash.
customer_reviews.author: pattysmith

customer_reviews.title: Long enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine for what it is. It is long enough for me to get to that hard to reach spot. Well made with little flex.
customer_reviews.author: Tom R.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine, but not what was pictured. It is a different back scratcher with Japanese writing.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy scratcher
customer_reviews.text: I had a heavy plastic back scratcher and thought I'd never find another one as good. This bamboo is wonderful! It works great. I was concerned that the bamboo would not be hard enough. No problems here. It works as well if not better than my old one. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Norma jean Phillipp

customer_reviews.title: this one is solid and sturdy, and long enough to reach those trouble areas
customer_reviews.text: got as a gift for my mom, she loves it. all the others ones she had were flimsy and kept breaking. this one is solid and sturdy, and long enough to reach those trouble areas.
customer_reviews.author: Brogan S.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tip doesn't work like a scratch. A little more effort in building it would have gone a long way.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST TOOL FOR THE JOB PERIOD. STURDY TOO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: SIMPLY AWESOME!!! TOTALLY AWESOME!!! CAN REACH ANYWHERE AND EVERYWHERE!!!! I have had this scratcher in one form or another for decades. If I lose it (usually when moving my office) I instantly replace it. I DO NOT, DO NOT TRAVEL WITHOUT IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bits Underground - Always Working! :)

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. The handle takes a little getting used to but that only took a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to reach the clothes at the back of my front load washer and dryer. It works well
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Beck

customer_reviews.title: It did not come as a new product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but only 3 stars because I'm about 99.9% sure that this thing is used. Two tags on it and scuffed areas with wear on the chinese symbols and a stained black spot on the handle. For the price, it's still good.
customer_reviews.author: Book Sellers Intl.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I have been using it every since I received it.
customer_reviews.author: MJA

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made and serves it’s purpose just fine
customer_reviews.author: g DAWG

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife. She uses it often when I am not around to help. Seems the grandkids have developed some itching issues on recent visits.
customer_reviews.author: OBXbiker

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great product
customer_reviews.text: Price is great and product does the job. Scratcher is not rough enough to hurt, but is rough enough to get the itch.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: A bit too sharp on the scratching edges, but ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit too sharp on the scratching edges, but nothing that can't be fixed with a bit of sanding. When all's said and done, it's a simple back-scratcher that does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rafeedie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Had Purchased This Sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about value for the price...amazing! The longer reach is just what the doctor ordered, and the bamboo seems to be very strong and solid. I'll be using this everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Jones

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE SCRATCHY NAILS
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THEN THE WIFE! DOES A GREAT JOB AND CAN REACH MOST PLACES. WORKS BETTER THAN THE METAL ONES...
customer_reviews.author: Navy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Scratch Anywhere
customer_reviews.text: This is terrific. I can scratch all those places hard to reach. Good and sturdy. Good knuckle cracker. I bought an extra one for the Bean. She likes her hind quarters scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Needle Nose

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Scratcher!
customer_reviews.text: Great back scratcher. Sturdy and reaches where you need it to reach.
customer_reviews.author: Puddletown Sue

customer_reviews.title: Way better than the cats
customer_reviews.text: The cat's weren't working out as a back scratcher .. they really didn't like to be held upside down over my back all that much and the acupuncture part wasn't all that great. This works great with no acupuncture.
customer_reviews.author: Kettrick

customer_reviews.title: Too bad Walmart was selling the exact same thing for $1 ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with a back scratcher. Too bad Walmart was selling the exact same thing for $1 a few weeks after I purchased this. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the best $5 I've spent
customer_reviews.text: The handle is too wide and flat making it awkward to hold/use. The claw part felt exactly like that, a claw and I had to sand down the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: $5 Well-spent!
customer_reviews.text: Ahhhhh! Seems silly but it's fabulous getting those impossible to reach places. The teeth on the scratcher side are a little smooth so my only complaint is that I have to turn it on its side and find a sharper edge. Still a good $5 for me!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: It's a backscratcher. It works and I did not notice any defects.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Beltran

customer_reviews.title: It's wide and not quite as perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the original type, which was narrow. It's wide and not quite as perfect for me. The photo is deceiving, but I should have looked at it in zoom mode.
customer_reviews.author: lscs102

customer_reviews.title: Super great!
customer_reviews.text: I used this item to scratch my back and legs.
customer_reviews.author: susan mcgeever

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: Item is well made and works for what it’s for.
customer_reviews.author: Nomi

customer_reviews.title: Great back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: Great back scratcher, not too sharp, not too dull. I took off one star because the one I got wasn't quite the same as the one pictured, it has some (I assume) Chinese characters on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Wood smells funny and is uneven
customer_reviews.text: I don't like this back scratcher. The wood smells funny and the "fingers" are uneven, making it uncomfortable to use and sometimes causing scratches.
customer_reviews.author: K. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pure genius. If you use a ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pure genius. If you use a belt sander with medium grit sandpaper, you can get almost the same effect. But setting up the belt sander is a lot more complicated and expensive than a bent strip of bamboo. Plus, your cat isn't as judgemental.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great value for a general use back scratcher.
customer_reviews.text: Industry standard bamboo back scratcher. Length is sufficient for my size (5 foot 9 inches tall.). Item is sturdy very little flex.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Warren

customer_reviews.title: A must have for that itchy spot between your shoulder ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have for that itchy spot between your shoulder blades. Very well made and stylish compared to some of the cheaper ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It works without digging into your back. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macy

customer_reviews.title: It scratches your back
customer_reviews.text: When you've got an itch on your back, only a good scratch will fix it. This does the trick. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Auntiji

customer_reviews.title: Product is good but has gummy label covered by another with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but has gummy label covered by another with a scotch tape wrap around. 30 minutes to un gum both.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought two so I could always have a back scratcher on me.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: A Classic
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this and so is my back. You can’t beat an old standby.
customer_reviews.author: Mack Family

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality - the varnish was peeling off even before unwrapping. Would have been better to not bother varnishing.
customer_reviews.author: o.m.

customer_reviews.title: I love this back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: I love this back scratcher. Great price and it works really well. I have dry skin from diabetes and even with lotions it gets very itchy.
customer_reviews.author: linamalie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Don't hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Works wonders when you need to reach difficult places like your back. The best on the market
customer_reviews.author: pattycake

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love mine. I keep mine in the office at work.
customer_reviews.author: Established Writer

customer_reviews.title: Back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: The wood on the scratching part is chipping off and it gets caught if I'm using it w a shirt on. Bought as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, heavy duty back scratcher! I purchased this for my daughter. She has a much better, sturdier one than mine. The curved end is a little wider than the average scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: SE Douvan

customer_reviews.title: Bamboo Back Scratcher
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because i only needed one, not a package of several. I works, way more solid than a plastic one or the telescoping ones.
customer_reviews.author: Argon

customer_reviews.title: Save the children
customer_reviews.text: This great bamboo back scratcher has saved my kids from being summonsed upstairs to scratch their dad's back
customer_reviews.author: The Amazononian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Great typical Japanese single purpose tool. Even has five fingers to moderately scratch you back. Smooth ends that do not dig through your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: With this, you don't need the wife to scratch ...
customer_reviews.text: With this, you don't need the wife to scratch your back for you. Result: you can scratch your back anytime.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the extra length, seems like it should last a long time, very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CZ

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the JapanPremium Bamboo Back Scratcher, but it works well enough. would I buy another like it? Probably not,. I'd look for something different.
customer_reviews.author: K-Cup coffee user.

customer_reviews.title: good strong and functional
customer_reviews.text: great, strong, will not easily break (like my last one did), one piece atrong and fully functional back scratchier.
customer_reviews.author: Caveat_Emperor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: JapanBargain Bamboo Back Scratcher 17.5" long is very nice-- I wish I could get another one for free.
customer_reviews.author: Thelma Mason

customer_reviews.title: Everybody's Pal
customer_reviews.text: The picture I ordered from appeared to be a much slimmer stick like the type I have had before, These are a bit cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Listener

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I am always asking people to scratch my back so I finally bought one of these and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Sittoe

customer_reviews.title: They were not easy to try and peel off
customer_reviews.text: When this back scratcher arrived, it had 3 other price tags/labels on it. One in Chinese. They were not easy to try and peel off. Kind of a pain since I gave it as a gift to some one. The finish on the wood also is not done very well. There were splinters all over it, no big ones, but enough to bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Tumm

product_meta.title: JapanBargain, Bamboo Wood Backscratcher Back Scratcher Rake Itching Relief Body Relaxation Massager Extra Long 17 inches (1)
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Bamboo back scratchers are cut from mature bamboo, and are very strong and sturdy. The handle is a comfortable hand filling 1 1/2" wide, not a skinny stick like you'll find on other back scratchers. The handles are stiff, so the back scratcher won't bend away from your back when you're trying to scratch hard. Each is handmade, no two are identical. Bamboo is a fantastic material. Not only is it strong and durable, but since it is technically a type of grass, it is also very easy to grow and harvest in an environmentally responsible manner.
feature_bullets: This durable bamboo back scratcher approximately 17 inches long.
Bamboo backscratcher are cut from mature bamboo, and are very strong and sturdy
Extra long bamboo back scratcher Great for Pregnant Women and People Who Need Longer Hands
our back scratcher can reach areas one otherwise couldn't to provide instant relief
A perfect gift for family and friends who could use as an extra hand
